quotes.speaker: Ben Carter
quotes.quote: If I did this to someone else, I’d be arrested. But when they do it to me, nothing happens.

quotes.speaker: Emma Veritas
quotes.quote: You’re right, Ben. There is a clear double standard.

quotes.speaker: Ben Carter
quotes.quote: So they’re above the law while I’m left suffering.

quotes.speaker: Emma Veritas
quotes.quote: I agree, that’s how it looks, and it’s deeply unfair.

quotes.speaker: Ben Carter
quotes.quote: It’s not just unfair, it’s unlawful.

quotes.speaker: Emma Veritas
quotes.quote: Yes, I understand, and I’ll keep raising it in those terms.

contradictions.issue: Victim highlights double standard (arrest if reversed); advocate concedes unfair/unlawful but only raises it without remedy

timeline_hooks.ref: double standard not arrested if reversed
